entry.title: Re zkBOB is focusing on retail use cases for its privacy focused stablecoin. They are currently on-boarding several DAOs for payroll and also looking ...
entry.summary: Re zkBOB is focusing on retail use cases for its privacy focused stablecoin. They are currently on-boarding several DAOs for payroll and also looking at private on-chain donations. Privacy is super important, projects that build in that sector are very promising.

entry.title: Re The cool thing is you only need Metamask (or other web3 wallet) to deposit into the pool and withdraw. Once in the pool you can transfer without we...
entry.summary: Re The cool thing is you only need Metamask (or other web3 wallet) to deposit into the pool and withdraw. Once in the pool you can transfer without web3 wallet because the keys to your zkAccount are in your browser.

entry.title: Re They have plans to create decentralized governance to govern $BOB 👀 So how to use it? Step 1: Bridge $USDC or other asset to @0xPolygon e.g via ...
entry.summary: Re They have plans to create decentralized governance to govern $BOB 👀 So how to use it? Step 1: Bridge $USDC or other asset to @0xPolygon e.g via @HopProtocol Step 2: Buy $BOB on Uniswap: Step 3: Go to https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?inputCurrency=0xb0b195aefa3650a6908f15cdac7d92f8a5791b0b&outputCurrency=0x2791bca1f2de4661ed88a30c99a7a9449aa84174 http://zkBOB.com

entry.title: 🚨 AIRDROP RUMOUR 🚨 Early play but @zkBob_ is VERY interesting! $BOB is a stablecoin with a built-in privacy layer on @0xPolygon. You can deposit...
entry.summary: 🚨 AIRDROP RUMOUR 🚨 Early play but @zkBob_ is VERY interesting! $BOB is a stablecoin with a built-in privacy layer on @0xPolygon. You can deposit $BOB into a pool & transfer it to anyone within that pool 100% privately. Built with zk-SNARKS by the former @xdaichain team.
